name: All My Bedrooms (and several memories within)
name_original: All My Bedrooms (and several memories within)
description:
A small personal journey through some small personal spaces.  

Controls: Arrow keys/WASD to move, Z/J to interact.

This game is mobile friendly.

Made with the wonderful GB Studio.

Donate at least $2 to get access to a Game Boy ROM download that you can run in a GB emulator or even flash to a cartridge to play on original hardware.

╔═══━━━─── • ───━━━═══╗
Made with love just for...?
